Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Also I'm adding #34: Biologically men are not designed to have content, happy, or enjoyable lives. Our sole purpose is as the provider and defender, and also sperm providers. We are basically incapable of feeling any emotion strongly except for anger and aggression, and this is our default. We have half the brain women do and are less smart as a result, not to mention almost zero creative ability; there are way more male "geniuses" but only because men are pressured to succeed while the women are allowed to be lazy because men have to do everything for them. The top IQ on record is from a woman, and brain scans have shown their cognitive abilities to be superior even though they are nowhere near as cultivated. And despite our role as the physical laborer and fighter, our pain tolerance is actually lower, because nature doesn't give a shit about us, only what we do for society. We are to toil in hard labor and risky, painful situations while everyone else reaps the benefits of it. And fail or even express the slightest discontentment about it, and society punishes you. As a man, your life is literally *supposed* to be miserable, both socially and biologically. Men are biologically stripped of any ability to feel content or happy. We are pawns and slaves, and no one cares about us. We die younger, suck at everything but athletics, are miserable all the time, and basically are slaves. Your life is destined to be miserable and you have to like it. Men have basically nothing good going for themselves. Nature gave men the rough end of the deal, with the exception of a few thousand years where they got jealous and oppressed the women, and that didn't help men, it just made women miserable too. At least we're not honey bees. No wonder "women have more depression" even though far more men kill themselves. Because everyone feels bad and sees it as a problem if a girl is depressed, but boys are *supposed* to feel that way and be miserable and just accept it.

Fuck off feminazis. You haven't the first clue about what male "privilege" is. None. Our lives are slavery, and even now that we have the opportunity for more for the first time, we still are biologically designed to be worthless slaves and rarely capable of anything else. You don't realize how much we have to pay just to be able to lap you on a track and be obligated to awful duties no one wants to do. It's not a fair trade, and guess what? You didn't get the rough end of deal, men did.

Fuck off feminazis. You haven't the first clue about what male "privilege" is. None. Our lives are slavery, and even now that we have the opportunity for more for the first time, we still are biologically designed to be worthless slaves and rarely capable of anything else. You don't realize how much we have to pay just to be able to lap you on a track and be obligated to awful duties no one wants to do. It's not a fair trade, and guess what? Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Is it a crime? Of course not, it's not your fault. But it does suck. Not because you're male, but because biologically men are not designed with them in mind, only what they do for society, while women are designed to feel happy and content themselves and be more productive as unique individuals rather than pawns. So if you're a man you're pretty much destined for a shitty life, no matter how lucky you are. This is not the fault of attitude or socialization but actual differences in how their brains and bodies work. Basically nature does not care about men at all.
body_html: Is it a crime? Of course not, it's not your fault. But it does suck. Not because you're male, but because biologically men are not designed with them in mind, only what they do for society, while women are designed to feel happy and content themselves and be more productive as unique individuals rather than pawns. So if you're a man you're pretty much destined for a shitty life, no matter how lucky you are. This is not the fault of attitude or socialization but actual differences in how their brains and bodies work. Basically nature does not care about men at all.

body: Pretty much. I currently have little interest in marriage or having kids (I'm young so that could change). I see society as evil and corrupt. I like to be creative and have fun, and I'm kind of a soloist, yet I am not capable of it. While I'm not being a worthless and replaceable pawn, what reason do I even have to live? Just to feel miserable longer? Just to fail more? No wonder men kill themselves a lot (Disclaimer: I'm not killing myself, too many people care about me and I still have the off-chance of finding some reason to live).

I like to be creative and have fun, and I'm kind of a soloist, yet I am not capable of it. While I'm not being a worthless and replaceable pawn, what reason do I even have to live? body: Sorry, I just don't see myself marrying right now, maybe that'll change when I get a little older. Also I'm definitely not raising girls to be "ladies" who do nothing but sit around wasting their higher potential while leeching off of men, they should actually be doing something with their brilliant minds. On top of that my genes are bad enough that I view me having a child as putting another innocent soul in my position (my advantages are good looks and that's literally it).

Also I'm definitely not raising girls to be "ladies" who do nothing but sit around wasting their higher potential while leeching off of men, they should actually be doing something with their brilliant minds. On top of that my genes are bad enough that I view me having a child as putting another innocent soul in my position (my advantages are good looks and that's literally it).

post.body:
Also I'm adding #34: Biologically men are not designed to have content, happy, or enjoyable lives. Our sole purpose is as the provider and defender, and also sperm providers. We are basically incapable of feeling any emotion strongly except for anger and aggression, and this is our default. We have half the brain women do and are less smart as a result, not to mention almost zero creative ability; there are way more male "geniuses" but only because men are pressured to succeed while the women are allowed to be lazy because men have to do everything for them. The top IQ on record is from a woman, and brain scans have shown their cognitive abilities to be superior even though they are nowhere near as cultivated. And despite our role as the physical laborer and fighter, our pain tolerance is actually lower, because nature doesn't give a shit about us, only what we do for society. We are to toil in hard labor and risky, painful situations while everyone else reaps the benefits of it. And fail or even express the slightest discontentment about it, and society punishes you. As a man, your life is literally *supposed* to be miserable, both socially and biologically. Men are biologically stripped of any ability to feel content or happy. We are pawns and slaves, and no one cares about us. We die younger, suck at everything but athletics, are miserable all the time, and basically are slaves. Your life is destined to be miserable and you have to like it. Men have basically nothing good going for themselves. Nature gave men the rough end of the deal, with the exception of a few thousand years where they got jealous and oppressed the women, and that didn't help men, it just made women miserable too. At least we're not honey bees. No wonder "women have more depression" even though far more men kill themselves. Because everyone feels bad and sees it as a problem if a girl is depressed, but boys are *supposed* to feel that way and be miserable and just accept it.

Fuck off feminazis. You haven't the first clue about what male "privilege" is. None. Our lives are slavery, and even now that we have the opportunity for more for the first time, we still are biologically designed to be worthless slaves and rarely capable of anything else. You don't realize how much we have to pay just to be able to lap you on a track and be obligated to awful duties no one wants to do. It's not a fair trade, and guess what? You didn't get the rough end of deal, men did.

body:
ya, that all makes sense to me

it's pretty rough... i noticed that too. Whenever I make any expression of frustration whatsoever people actually get mad at me. I'm an extremely disciplined person. I don't really complain almost ever either
